description: Accessibility rules configuration for PayU Web App - WCAG 2.1 Level AA compliance

color-contrast.description: Ensures the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG AA standards (4.5:1 for normal text, 3:1 for large text)

image-alt.description: Ensures elements have alternate text or are marked as decorative

label.description: Ensures every form element has a label

aria-labels.description: Ensures ARIA labels are correctly used

aria-allowed-attr.description: Ensures ARIA attributes are allowed for an element's role

aria-required-attr.description: Ensures elements with ARIA roles have all required attributes

aria-required-children.description: Ensures elements with ARIA roles have required children

aria-roles.description: Ensures elements with ARIA roles use valid, non-abstract ARIA roles

aria-valid-attr-value.description: Ensures all ARIA attributes have valid values

heading-order.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct

html-has-lang.description: Ensures every HTML document has a lang attribute

valid-lang.description: Ensures lang attributes have valid values

landmark-one-main.description: Ensures the document has a main landmark

region.description: Ensures all content is contained within a landmark region

skip-link.description: Ensures the page has a skip link for keyboard navigation

focus-order-semantics.description: Ensures elements in the focus order have an appropriate role

tabindex.description: Ensures tabindex is not used to change the tab order

valid-id.description: Ensures id attribute values are valid

scope-attr-valid.description: Ensures scope attributes are used correctly on table headers

td-headers-attr.description: Ensures the headers attribute on td elements refers to th elements

th-has-data-cells.description: Ensures each th element has data cells it describes

aria-hidden-body.description: Ensures aria-hidden is not present on the document body

aria-hidden-focus.description: Ensures aria-hidden elements are not focusable

role-img-alt.description: Ensures elements with role=img have an alt text

form-field-multiple-labels.description: Ensures form fields do not have multiple labels

input-button-name.description: Ensures input buttons have discernible text
